results.name: Binary weight of A327976.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences related to cellular automata
program: \\ Use this one for writing b-files:
A328108write(up_to) = { my(s=1, t, n=0); for(n=1,up_to, t = A269160(s); write("b328108.txt", n, " ", hammingweight(bitxor(2*A030101(s), t))); s = t); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 05 2019
